2B1a1b1y1l1o1n1i1a1n1 1a1n1d1 1E1g1y1p1t1i1a1n1 1m1a1t1h1e1m1a1t1i1c1i1a1n1s1 1u1s1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1e1q1u1a1t1i1o1n1 1c1e1n1t1u1r1i1e1s1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1a1s1,1 1s1a1y1s1 1K1a1r1e1n1 1E1v1a1 1C1a1r2,1 1a1 1r1e1t1i1r1e1d1 1h1i1s1t1o1r1i1a1n1 1a1t1 1P1o1r1t1l1a1n1d1 1S1t1a1t1e1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1,1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1 1m1a1n1y1 1s1c1h1o1l1a1r1s1 1l1e1a1v1e1 1o1p1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1s2i1b1i1l1i1t1y1 1h1e1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1p1r1o2f1.1 1M1o1r1e1o1v1e1r1,1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1a1s1'1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1a1t2r1i1b1u1t1e1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1w1n1 1m1a1t1h1e1m1a1t1i1c1a1l1 1d1i1s1c1o1v1e1r1i1e1s1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1m1a1s1t1e1r1,1 1m1a1k1i1n1g1 1i1t1 1i1m1p1o1s2i1b1l1e1 1t1o1 1u1n1t1a1n1g1l1e1 1w1h1o1 1i1n1v1e1n1t1e1d1 1w1h1a1t1.1
2E1v1e1n1 1s1o1,1 1w1e1 1k1n1o1w1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1 1t1o1 1s1u1s1p1e1c1t1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1a1s1 1w1a1s1 1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1g1r1e1a1t1 1m1a1t1h1e1m1a1t1i1c1i1a1n1s1 1o1f1 1a1n1t1i1q1u1i1t1y1.1 1H1i1s1 1i1n1f1l1u1e1n1c1e1 1w1a1s1 1w1i1d1e1s1p1r1e1a1d1 1a1n1d1 1l1a1s1t1i1n1g1.1 1T1h1e1o1r1e1t1i1c1a1l1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1i1s1t1 1J1a1m1e1s1 1O1v1e1r1d1u1i1n1 1s1e2s1 1a1n1 1u1n1b1r1o1k1e1n1 1c1h1a1i1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1a1s1 1t1o1 1A1l1b1e1r1t1 1E1i1n1s1t1e1i1n1,1 1w1h1o1s1e1 1w1o1r1k1 1o1n1 1c1u1r1v1i1n1g1 1s1p1a1c1e1 1a1n1d1 1t1i1m1e1 1O1v1e1r1d1u1i1n1 1c1a1l2s1 1"1p1h1y1s1i1c1s1 1a1s1 1g1e1o1m1e1t1r1y1.1"1
2E1v1e1n1 1t1o1d1a1y1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1e1a1 1o1f1 1n1u1m1e1r1i1c1a1l1 1f1o1r1m1u1l1a1s1 1t1y1p1i1c1a1l2y1 1o1n1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1i1s1t1s1'1 1b1l1a1c1k1b1o1a1r1d1s1 1s1u1g2e1s1t1s1 1t1h1e1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1e1a1n1 1m1a1x1i1m1 1"1A1l2 1i1s1 1n1u1m1b1e1r1,1"1 1a1n1 1i1m1p1l1i1c1a1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1c1a1n1 1b1e1 1e1x1p1l1a1i1n1e1d1,1 1o1r1g1a1n1i1z1e1d1 1a1n1d1,1 1i1n1 1m1a1n1y1 1c1a1s1e1s1,1 1p1r1e1d1i1c1t1e1d1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1m1a1t1h1e1m1a1t1i1c1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1e1a1n1 1t1h1e1o1r1e1m1 1p1r1o2f1 1d1o1e1s1n1'1t1 1j1u1s1t1 1w1o1r1k1 1s1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1s1,1 1m1o1s1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1t1i1m1e1 1o1r1 1w1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1a1r1s1 1a1l1i1g1n1 1-1 1i1t1 1w1o1r1k1s1 1a1l2 1t1h1e1 1t1i1m1e1.1 1P1y1t1h1a1g1o1r1a1s1'1 1l1e1g1a1c1y1 1i1n1c1l1u1d1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1f1i1c1 1h1a1l2m1a1r1k1s1 1o1f1 1p1a1t2e1r1n1,1 1o1r1d1e1r1,1 1r1e1p1l1i1c1a1t1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1t1y1.1 1-1 1M1.1B1.1
